formSettings.name: Adarsh
formSettings.aboutme: Passionate MERN stack developer based in New Delhi, dedicated to the art of coding and exploration across diverse tech domainsâ€”ranging from web and mobile app development to cybersecurity and ethical hacking. With a dream to evolve into a successful modern full-stack developer, my goal is to secure a rewarding position in a forward-thinking tech company where I can contribute my skills and continuously grow in the dynamic world of software development.

work.title: Self-Taught Web Developer
work.summary: Acquired proficiency in the MERN stack through self-guided learning and hands-on project work.
summaryArr: Acquired proficiency in the MERN stack through self-guided learning and hands-on project work.

projects.title: Rainbownote
projects.summary: A note taking app with GitHub login, trash management and public note sharing.Powered by Vite React,Appwrite,React-Query and Tailwind CSS.
summaryArr: A note taking app with GitHub login, trash management and public note sharing.Powered by Vite React,Appwrite,React-Query and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Tech-Canvas
projects.summary: Developed a dynamic Next.js-powered blog app with SEO optimization, a global search bar and secure admin panel.Utilized Firebase for seamless image uploads.
summaryArr: Developed a dynamic Next.js-powered blog app with SEO optimization, a global search bar and secure admin panel.Utilized Firebase for seamless image uploads.

projects.title: Phone-Book
projects.summary: A Next.js-powered contact management web app.In this app user can create a free account and store contact information.
summaryArr: A Next.js-powered contactmanagement web app.In this app user can create a free account and store contact information.
